parseKey

public static Dir parseKey(int key)
Parses a keyboard key to a Dir.

Parameters:
key - Key code of key to parse.
Returns:
A Dir representing the key. If the parse fails, null will be returned.

isDiag

public boolean isDiag()
Checks whether this Dir is diagonal.

Returns:
True if this Dir is diagonal, else false.

split

public Dir[] split()
Splits diagonal Dirs into two non-diagonal Dirs.

If this Dir is not diagonal the array that is returned will contain this Dir.

Returns:
A Dir[] containing two non-diagonal Dirs.

equals

public boolean equals(Dir d)
Checks if this Dir is equals to another Dir.

Parameters:
d - The Dir to compare to.
Returns:
True if the Dirs are equal, else false.

getAllDirs

public static Dir[] getAllDirs()
Return a Dir array containing all 8 possible directions.

Returns:
A Dir array containing all 8 possible directions.
